name: AppleMuncher
description:
Play as this exciting little Squirrel that is in search of apples in order to survive the winter!

(Game is in its early stages so i beg that if you decide to try it out to please post any issues that you might find or ideas to improve the game)

Only essential code done. No polishing whatsoever.

Polishing will start after today.

To add: Enemy type that will steal apples and chase you.

Character - Mixamo

Animations - Mixamo

Apples - Me

Car - Free3d.com
